WorkItem.ClosedComment: Duplicate, already fixed for .15. The Stamina to Health multiplier hadn't been updated for Cata
WorkItem.Description:
Working with my prot. warrior in Rawr I noticed that health values aren't displaying the same in Rawr compared to in-game.  Here are the values that I'm seeing: (Note: In-game I have mining with a bonus +3 stam.  I didn't think this would make or break the difference seen here. No professions, or buffs, were selected in Rawr.)
 
Edit: All equipped gear values were updated before ticket was made.
 
Untalented + naked in-game = Stamina: 176, Health: 45489
Untalented (prot model) + no gear = Stamina: 198, Health: 45085
 
Talented + naked in-game = Stamina: 202, Health: 45853
Talented + no gear Rawr= Stamina: 198, Health: 45085
 
Talented + Geared in-game = Stamina: 5196, Health: 115769
Talented + geared Rawr = Stamina: 5192, Health: 95670
 
With gear and talents I'm seeing a difference of nearly 20k health.  Is there something behind the scenes that affects this?  Thanks for your time.
